class.name: rviz/MultiMapPoseTool
class.description: 2D Pose estimate tool in multi-map environments

class.name: rviz/BaseMapCommPoseTool
class.description: Tool for estimating the common pose in the base (reference) map (To be used with MapManager)

class.name: rviz/SecondaryMapCommPoseTool
class.description: Tool for estimating the common pose in the secondary map. (To be used with MapManager)
